17#ifndef _LVM_PV_ALLOC_H
18
19int alloc_pv_segment_whole_pv(struct dm_pool *mem, struct physical_volume *pv);
20int peg_dup(struct dm_pool *mem, struct dm_list *peg_new, struct dm_list *peg_old);
21struct pv_segment *assign_peg_to_lvseg(struct physical_volume *pv, uint32_t pe,
22 uint32_t area_len,
23 struct lv_segment *seg,
24 uint32_t area_num);
25int pv_split_segment(struct physical_volume *pv, uint32_t pe);
26int release_pv_segment(struct pv_segment *peg, uint32_t area_reduction);
27int check_pv_segments(struct volume_group *vg);
28void merge_pv_segments(struct pv_segment *peg1, struct pv_segment *peg2);
29
30#endif
